body.name: VIVCCON 3 IN 1 Makeup Brush Cleaner & Restorer and Makeup Remover, Removes Makeup, Dirt & Impurities From Makeup Brushes, Puff Sponges, Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Hypoallergenic (1PCS/180ML)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 27 mins
features: Upgraded Makeup Brush Cleanser & Restorer - VIVCCON makeup brush cleanser not only deeply cleanses your brushes but also protects the bristles with its unique oil-based formula. It effectively removes makeup brush dirt, makeup, oils, and odors, significantly extending the lifespan of your valuable makeup tools.

Deep Makeup Remover Cleansing Oil - Enriched with natural rosemary oil, thoroughly cleanses makeup, sunscreen, lipstick, facial dirt, and oils from the skin. Its gentle sliding rosemary oil provides utmost comfort while safeguarding the skin against friction during cleansing and makeup removal. Suitable for all skin types.

Innovative Natural Ingredients - Packed with natural antioxidant rosemary oil and highly effective cleansing agents, this product is formulated to be gentle, non-irritating, alcohol-free, fragrance-free, gluten-free, paraben-free, and phthalate-free. It deeply cleanses the face, enhances skin tone, and moisturizes the bristles of expensive natural makeup brushes.

Easy Steps - 1. Deep cleaning: Wet the brush, then pour VIVCCON brush cleanser into a container or directly onto the brush/sponge/puff. Cleanse until emulsified using a cleaning pad, then rinse with water and gently pat dry with a cotton pad; 2. Makeup removal: Wet hands and facial skin, pour a small amount of the cleansing essence onto your hands, massage in circular motions to emulsify and remove makeup, then rinse with water.

Tips - VIVCCON Professional Makeup Brush Cleanser is a gentle oil-based conditioner suitable for cleaning and protecting all expensive natural makeup brush bristles. It can also be used as a daily cleansing oil and makeup remover for all skin types.

This process emulsifies the oil and leaves skin smooth and clean. * Natural and healthy, can be used for daily cleansing and makeup removal of the skin. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: Great product for cleaning make-up brushes. Easy to use and mess free. I like the mild smell as well. Can also be used to remove make-up! it can be used for multiple uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just make up cleaner works well and cleaning my brushes and getting rid of the excess residue that I wasn't able to get off deep in the brushes because I procrastinate in cleaning them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a great brush cleaner.
reviews.reviewText: Was too greasy for my natural hair brushes. Left them looking stringy and splayed out despite a good rinse afterwards. Has to rewash them again because when they dried they were still greasy and badly screwed up my eye makeup. It was like putting eyeshadow with a makeup remover swab. Same result.As a makeup remover this product works better, but you must use another cleanser afterwards to remove the greasy film off of the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I never really used a cleanser designated specifically for makeup brushes. I have to say I definitely see the difference. It gets rid of makeup grease much easier and faster. My brushes are like new after this cleanser, soft and fluffy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No limpia nada, no pierdan su dinero.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a cleansing oil for your brushes!
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser works faster than the regular brush cleaner I have. The magic must be because of the oils. It does really well at getting the makeup that's worked it's way deep into the bristles. My foundation brush is especially difficult to clean because of the nature of the foundation (it's designed to stay put, and it takes that role seriously), but this cleanser seeps down into the mess and breaks it down so it can be rinsed away so much easier.I always use a scrub mat (it's technically a shallow scrub bowl) to help in working out the makeup and dirt, and I used it with this cleanser as well. I also gave my brushes a quick rinse with my gentle face wash after cleaning them with this cleanser. I probably didn't need to do this, but as someone who has a tendency to break out easily, I was worried about the oil sitting on the bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to remove
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and easy to remove the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stuff works well to clean your makeup brushes. I use this with a cleaning machine to get the most off and now my brushes are like new.
